name: Repair Shop Game
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 submission.

Not the prettiest thing, but not bad for 3 days IMO. Used Unity's parenting system to add a connector class and pair objects, with a recursive function to reverse the hierarchy of objects when grabbed.

I may come back to it at some point to make the gameloop more fun, add models, and some visual interest around the table (customers walking in and placing weapons, etc.)
